query.sql: SELECT class_id, class_name, class_code, enable_flag, t.last_update_by, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') create_date, DATE_FORMAT(t.last_update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') last_update_date, (select CONCAT(CONCAT(user_code,'-'),user_name) from sys_user where user_id =t.last_update_by) last_update_user FROM fnd_class t #WHERE_CLAUSE# order by class_code

sqls.executeSql: INSERT INTO fnd_class (class_name, class_code, enable_flag, create_by, last_update_by, create_date, last_update_date) VALUES (${@class_name}, ${@class_code}, ${@enable_flag}, ${@user_id}, ${@user_id}, NOW(), NOW())
update fnd_class set class_name = ${@class_name} , enable_flag = ${@enable_flag} , last_update_by =${@user_id} , last_update_date = NOW() where class_id = ${@class_id}

query.name: combo_all
query.sql: SELECT class_id , class_name FROM fnd_class c where c.enable_flag ='Y' order by class_name

query.name: combo
query.sql: SELECT distinct c.class_id , class_name FROM fnd_class c,fnd_course co WHERE c.class_id = co.class_id AND c.enable_flag ='Y' AND co.teacher_id = (SELECT te.teacher_id FROM fnd_teacher te WHERE te.teacher_code = ${@user_code}) order by class_name
